name: Hunters View Empowerment Center
description: Empowers youth in our Hunters Vview housing development by providing exposure to multiple artistic disciplines, ensuring they can explore and engage with various forms of artistic expression. Builds motor, language, and decision making skills across different age groups.
fullDescription: Empowers youth in our Hunters Vview housing development by providing exposure to multiple artistic disciplines, ensuring they can explore and engage with various forms of artistic expression. Builds motor, language, and decision making skills across different age groups.
whatTheyOffer: Empowers youth in our Hunters Vview housing development by providing exposure to multiple artistic disciplines, ensuring they can explore and engage with various forms of artistic expression. Builds motor, language, and decision making skills across different age groups.
howToGetIt: To register, please contact your resident services coordinator. You may also call the Bayview YMCA at 415-822-7728 for more information and support. This program is for Hunters View residents and their children. The program has no set enrollment or referral time period.
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Bayview Hunters Point
